title.rendered: RHINO BAR SUIT NISSAN NAVARA NP300

content.rendered:
THE NISSAN NAVARA NP300 3D EVOLUTION FRONT BAR IS IN AUSTRALIA

The Nissan Navara NP300 3D Evolution bar is now available

-The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing Flat Black Powder coat as standard and can be colour coded as an option. It is a 3 and 6mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate and recovery points not offered on other brands. The mid top section comes standard in Black or can be optioned as stainless steel. We also offer as standard, LED fog lights which are also an option on many other brands.

Includes:

Standard with Winch mount

Integrated LED Foglights

5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate

2 x Vehicle recovery points

Optional:

Can be colour coded to your vehicle specification

Middle winch plate insert can be optioned as stainless steel

Shackles

Winch

Spotlight bar

Spotlights

excerpt.rendered:
RHINO BAR SUIT NISSAN NAVARA NP300

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
